name: Go Elwood Go!
overview: Released for the Silly Venture programming contest in 2010, Go Elwood Go! is a side scrolling game in which you control the mentioned Elwood, who happens to strongly resemble a character with a brother from some blues movie. Bullets appear on the right in groups of threes and randomly release towards you, and occasional alligators/cars also appear running along the surface. You can jump over things and fire a shot one a time; a fired shot jumps with you (up and down), so it's possible to curve a shot into an enemy bullet at times.
